text: José Cardoso Dutra (18 July 1937 – 6 January 2022) was a Brazilian politician. He was a member of the Brazilian Democratic Movement and later the Brazilian Labour Party. He was a member of the Legislative Assembly of Amazonas from 1971 to 1979 and again from 1983 to 1987. He then was in the Chamber of Deputies from 1987 to 1995. Cardoso Dutra was born in Barreirinha, Brazil. Cardoso Dutra died from cardiac arrest in Brasília, Brazil on 6 January 2022, at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Brazilian Democratic Movement politicians Category:Amazonas (Brazil)
title: José Cardoso Dutra
